SEARCH
Package BE

Class Suggestion

java.lang.Object
BE.Suggestion
public class Suggestion extends Object
Represents a suggestion made by a user regarding a camp.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Suggestion

      public Suggestion(User sender, String message, String camp, SuggestStatus status)
      Constructs a Suggestion object with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      sender - The user who sent the suggestion.
      message - The content of the suggestion.
      camp - The camp associated with the suggestion.
      status - The status of the suggestion (e.g., pending, approved).
